mapper.select: SELECT o."entityName" "name", u."nickname" "userName", u.avatar "userAvatar", a.nickname "assigneeName", a.Avatar "assigneeAvatar", o.* FROM "TstAlert" o LEFT JOIN "TstUser" u on o."userId" = u.id LEFT JOIN "TstUser" a on o."assigneeId" = a.id WHERE o."assigneeId" = #{userId} AND ( (o."startTime" IS NOT null AND o."startTime" >= #{startTimeOfToday} AND o."startTime" <= #{endTimeOfToday}) OR (o."endTime" IS NOT null AND o."endTime" >= #{startTimeOfToday} AND o."endTime" <= #{endTimeOfToday}) ) AND NOT o."isRead" AND NOT o.deleted AND NOT o.disabled ORDER BY o."startTime" ASC
mapper.insert: insert into "TstAlert" ("type", title, "userId", "assigneeId", "entityId", "startTime", "endTime", "isRead", "isSent", deleted, disabled, "createTime") values (#{type}, #{title}, #{userId}, #{assigneeId}, #{entityId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, NOW())
mapper.update:
update "TstAlert" alert set alert."isRead" = true
where alert.id IN (${ids}) AND alert."assigneeId" = #{userId} AND NOT alert."isRead" AND NOT alert.deleted AND NOT alert.disabled
